name: OR_LOG_IB_HIST
description: The OR_LOG_IB_HIST table contains OR management system log In Basket history.

columns.name: LOG_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the log record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The number of the line of the In Basket history for the log.

columns.name: IB_HIST_ACTION_C_NAME
columns.description: The category value which indicates the type of action the message serves to notify.

columns.name: IB_HIST_DATE
columns.description: The date and time the message was sent.

columns.name: IB_HIST_BODY_LINE
columns.description: The line number where the message body begins in the OR_LOG_IB_BODY record.

columns.name: IB_HIST_BODY_LEN
columns.description: The length of the message body in the OR_LOG_IB_BODY record.
